desc: Fine Wines and Home Brew of Windber, PA is the only local hobby shop in our area that also features a full online catalog! We offer high-quality wine making and beer brewing supplies and equipment. If you can’t find what you need, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We want to help make your hobby experience fun!

layout.text: 15% OFF Vintner's Best Fruit Wine Bases thru August 31!
